This resource list was last updated on `r format(Sys.time(), '%b %d, %Y')`.
Use the search box and filters to find resources by type, language, or category.

```{r}
#| message: false
#| warning: false

resources <- readr::read_delim(
  here::here("data", "resources.csv"),
  delim = ";",
  show_col_types = FALSE
) |>
  dplyr::mutate(
    link_text = stringr::str_remove_all(link, "https://|http://|/$"),
    link_text = stringr::str_trunc(link_text, 40),
    link = glue::glue("<a href='{link}' target='_blank'>{link_text}</a>")
  ) |>
  dplyr::select(-link_text) |>
  dplyr::mutate(
    category = stringr::str_replace_all(category, ";", ", ")
  ) |>
  dplyr::rename(
    Type = type,
    Title = title,
    Link = link,
    Language = language,
    Category = category
  )
```

```{r}
#| message: false

library(htmltools)

filter_fct <- function(values, name) {
  tags$select(
    tags$option(value = "", "All"),
    purrr::map(sort(unique(values)), tags$option),
    onchange = glue::glue(
      "Reactable.setFilter(
        'resources-tbl',
        '{name}',
        event.target.value
      )"
    )
  )
}
```

```{r}
resources |>
  dplyr::arrange(Type, Title) |>
  reactable::reactable(
    columns = list(
      Type = reactable::colDef(
        name = "Type",
        filterInput = filter_fct,
        maxWidth = 120
      ),
      Title = reactable::colDef(
        name = "Title",
        minWidth = 180,
        style = list(whiteSpace = "normal", wordBreak = "break-word")
      ),
      Link = reactable::colDef(
        name = "Link",
        html = TRUE,
        minWidth = 200,
        style = list(whiteSpace = "normal", wordBreak = "break-word")
      ),
      Language = reactable::colDef(
        name = "Language",
        filterInput = filter_fct,
        maxWidth = 120
      ),
      Category = reactable::colDef(
        name = "Category",
        minWidth = 150,
        style = list(whiteSpace = "normal", wordBreak = "break-word")
      )
    ),
    searchable = TRUE,
    striped = TRUE,
    pagination = TRUE,
    showPageSizeOptions = TRUE,
    pageSizeOptions = c(10, 25, 50, 100),
    defaultPageSize = 25,
    compact = TRUE,
    elementId = "resources-tbl",
    filterable = TRUE,
    sortable = TRUE,
    showSortable = TRUE,
    highlight = TRUE,
    bordered = TRUE
  )
```
